Text.val: //I need this variable to define the "alias variable" for the DEBH_NO
additional search name and address from scan task
this program build a dynamic sql-statement which depends on the
input fields in the search screen !
27.08.2014 AS SCR#19068 Calling CV2 version of ICA190 now
22.05.2013 AS SCR#18126 fixed SQL statement for two queyr parameters
07.05.2013 AS SCR#18126 fixed SQL statemen if there's a cross join due to incompatibility with OS400 6.1
25.10.2011 AS disabled verifies to reduce logsize
28.04.2011 SH SCR16428 Replaced GB002 by GB902
29.09.2006 AK SCR11517 search on DEBH will result in search DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH
12.05.2006 AS SCR11081 fixed all combined issu and security hole
20.12.2005 JP SCR9765 changed single DHIC_ID search as described in SCR.
03.11.2005 JP SCR9386 changed handling for reserved words
27.10.2005 JP SCR9195 extend search, see SCR
29.08.2005 JP SCR8936 fixed bug in debtor search (see SCR)
18.08.2005 JP SCR8750 fixed bug in debtor search (see SCR)
30.06.2004 AS SCR8624 fixed hardcoded collection name FLPROD
18.05.2005 JP SCR8303 fixed bug in debtor search, see SCR
12.04.2005 JP SCR7913 add handling for only debtors from blacklist
//30-09-2004 JP SCR #7093 added hardcoded extract character string
//21-07-2004 JP SCR #6667 add search handling for debtor ID numbers
//05-04-2004 JP SCR #5888 block extraction for the first three characters
//01-04-2004 JP SCR #5766 add blocking search with reserved words
//10-02-2004 AS SCR #1402 cancelling debtor client search with ESC seemed not to
work because the Subtask WriteResultForDEBCSearch opened a task window
//15-01-2004 JP SCR #5196 add new search filter
//05-11-2003 JP request JP: change first param in call GB002 from "D" to "H"
//14-07-2003 JP SCR #3595 replace INSTR() value in Country task
//04-07-2003 JP request DD: fixed problem with DHSH and country search
(within where clause there was a cast-statement)
//02-07-2003 JP request JDO: implement range on DEBC_NO when writing result from
DEBC ( if a lot of identical DEBC_DEBH-> search is to long)
//06-06-2003 JP SCR #3690 decrease SearchRate ONLY until=2 in "OnlyActive" task
//10-03-2003 JP SCR #3089 only allow second search word > 1 letter
//11-12-2002 JP SCR #2516 implement new behavior for extraction with global
string. This string contains the possible separators.
//05-06-2002 JP added search for country code SCR #1406
//19-06-2002 JP change building SQL statement due to problems with the
scan name and address search words
sql statment for couintry code search
//table DEBH is already in SQL statement
Restrict all DEBC queries to allowed clients ....
22.05.2013 "hack" to fix SQL problem with OS400 v6

ExpSyntax.val: RepStr ({0,33},' WHERE ',' INNER JOIN '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/CFLC ON CFLC_ADMNOALLOWED = DEBC_ADMNO AND CFLC_CLNTNOALLOWED = DEBC_CLNTNO WHERE (CFLC_ADMNO = '&Trim (Str ({0,40},''))&') AND (CFLC_CLNTNO = '&Trim (Str ({0,41},''))&') AND (CFLC_USRID = '''&Trim ({0,42})&''') AND ')
RepStr ({0,33},' WHERE ',' WHERE DEBC_ADMNO='&Trim (Str ({0,43},''))&' AND DEBC_CLNTNO='&Trim (Str ({0,44},''))&' AND ')
RepStr ({0,33}, 'FLPROD/DHSH a,FLPROD/DHSH', 'FLPROD/DHSH a CROSS JOIN FLPROD/DHSH')

Text.val: eliminate points and hyphens in the address (street) name
BUT : only if there is an additional blnak separator !!!
first start -> up to letter number 4
//05-04-2004 JP SCR #5888 block extraction for the first three characters
extract second search word and delete all text up from the first word
extract second search word and delete all text up from the first word
extract second search word and delete all text up from the first word

ExpSyntax.val: 'SELECT DEBC_DEBH,DEBC_NO FROM '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/DEBC WHERE DEBC_DEBC='''&Trim ({1,3})&''' FOR FETCH ONLY'
'SELECT DEBC_DEBH,DEBC_NO FROM '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/DEBC WHERE DEBC_DEBC='''&Trim ({1,3})&''' and DEBC_DEBH='&Trim (Str ({1,2},'#9'))&' FOR FETCH ONLY'
'SELECT a.DEBH_NO,CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(9,0)) FROM '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/DEBH a WHERE a.DEBH_NO='&Trim (Str ({1,2},'#9'))&' FOR FETCH ONLY'
'SELECT a.DEBH_NO,CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(9,0)) FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DEBH a WHERE a.DEBH_NO='&Trim (Str ({1,2},'#9'))&' or a.DEBH_NO='&Trim (Str ({0,2},'#9'))&' FOR FETCH ONLY'
'SELECT DEBC_DEBH,DEBC_NO FROM '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/DEBC WHERE DEBC_DEBH='&Trim (Str ({1,2},'#9'))&' FOR FETCH ONLY'
'SELECT DEBC_DEBH,DEBC_NO FROM '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/DEBC WHERE ( DEBC_DEBH='&Trim (Str ({1,2},'#9'))&' '&Trim ({0,3})&') FOR FETCH ONLY'
'SELECT DEBC_DEBH,DEBC_NO FROM '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/DEBC WHERE 1=1 FOR FETCH ONLY'
'SELECT DEBC_DEBH,DEBC_NO FROM '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/DEBC WHERE DEBC_DEBC='''&Trim ({1,3})&''' FOR FETCH ONLY'

Text.val: bulid union with DEBP if only telephon-number search

ExpSyntax.val: IF ({1,30}='','a.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=1 and a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,5})&'%''','a.DHSH_DEBH_NO=aa.DHSH_DEBH_NO and a.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=1 and a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,5})&'%'''&' and aa.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=1 and aa.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,30})&'%''')

Trim ({0,9})&' b.DHSH_DEBH_NO=bb.DHSH_DEBH_NO and b.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=2 and b.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,6})&'%'' and '&IF ({1,31}<='999','bb.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=3','bb.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=2')&' and bb.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,31})&'%'''

IF ({1,32}='',Trim ({0,11})&' c.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=4 and c.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,8})&'%''',Trim ({0,11})&' c.DHSH_DEBH_NO=cc.DHSH_DEBH_NO and c.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=4 and c.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,8})&'%'''&' and cc.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=4 and cc.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,32})&'%''')
'SELECT '&Trim ({1,29})&'.DHSH_DEBH_NO,CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(9,0)) FROM '&Trim ({0,7})&' WHERE '&Trim ({0,14})&' FOR FETCH ONLY'
Left ({1,33},InStr ({1,33},'FOR FETCH ONLY')-1)&' union SELECT DEBP_DEBH_NO,CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(9,0)) FROM '&Trim ({0,1})&'/DEBP WHERE DEBP_TEL like '''&Trim ({1,10})&'%'''&' FOR FETCH ONLY'

Text.val: update SQL string with necessary search tables
update SQL string with where clause

ExpSyntax.val: IF ({1,30}='','a.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=1 and a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,5})&'%''','a.DHSH_DEBH_NO=aa.DHSH_DEBH_NO and a.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=1 and a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,5})&'%'''&' and aa.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=1 and aa.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,30})&'%''')

IF ({1,31}='',Trim ({0,9})&' b.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=2 and b.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,6})&'%''',Trim ({0,9})&' b.DHSH_DEBH_NO=bb.DHSH_DEBH_NO and b.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=2 and b.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,6})&'%'''&' and bb.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=2 and bb.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,31})&'%''')

Trim ({0,9})&' b.DHSH_DEBH_NO=bb.DHSH_DEBH_NO and b.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=2 and b.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,6})&'%'' and '&IF ({1,31}<='999','bb.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=3','bb.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=2')&' and bb.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,31})&'%'''

', '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/DHIC WHERE'&IF ({1,14}<>'',' DHIC_INFS_CODE='''&Trim ({1,14})&'''','')&IF ({1,13}<>'' AND {1,14}<>'',' AND ','')&IF ({1,13}<>'',' DHIC_ID like '''&Trim ({1,13})&'%''','')&' AND DEBC_DEBH=DHIC_DEBH AND'
' and (DEBC_BANKACCOUNT='''&Trim ({1,11})&''' or DEBC_NO in (select DCBA_DEBC_NO FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DCBA where DCBA_LASTRECVPAYBANKACCOUNT='''&Trim ({1,11})&'''))'
' and (DEBC_BANKID='&Trim (Str ({1,12},'#9'))&' or DEBC_NO in (select DCBA_DEBC_NO FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DCBA where DCBA_LASTRECVPAYBANKID ='&Trim (Str ({1,12},'#9'))&'))'
' (DEBC_BANKID='&Trim (Str ({1,12},'#9'))&' or DEBC_NO in (select DCBA_DEBC_NO FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DCBA where DCBA_LASTRECVPAYBANKID ='&Trim (Str ({1,12},'#9'))&'))'
'SELECT DHIC_DEBH,CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(9,0)) FROM '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/DHIC WHERE DHIC_ID like '''&Trim ({1,13})&'%'' FOR FETCH ONLY'
'SELECT DHIC_DEBH,CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(9,0)) FROM '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/DHIC WHERE DHIC_INFS_CODE='''&Trim ({1,14})&''' FOR FETCH ONLY'

'SELECT DHIC_DEBH,CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(9,0)) FROM '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/DHIC WHERE DHIC_INFS_CODE='''&Trim ({1,14})&''' and DHIC_ID like '''&Trim ({1,13})&'%'' FOR FETCH ONLY'

'SELECT DEBC_DEBH,CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(9,0)) FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DEBC WHERE DEBC_BANKACCOUNT='''&Trim ({1,11})&''' or DEBC_NO in (select DCBA_DEBC_NO FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DCBA where DCBA_LASTRECVPAYBANKACCOUNT='''&Trim ({1,11})&''') FOR FETCH ONLY'

'SELECT DEBC_DEBH,CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(9,0)) FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DEBC WHERE DEBC_BANKID='&Trim (Str ({1,12},'#9'))&' or DEBC_NO in (select DCBA_DEBC_NO FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DCBA where DCBA_LASTRECVPAYBANKID ='&Trim (Str ({1,12},'#9'))&') FOR FETCH ONLY'

'SELECT DEBC_DEBH,CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(9,0)) FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DEBC WHERE (DEBC_BANKACCOUNT='''&Trim ({1,11})&''' or DEBC_NO in (select DCBA_DEBC_NO FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DCBA where DCBA_LASTRECVPAYBANKACCOUNT='''&Trim ({1,11})&''')) and '&Trim ({0,3})&' FOR FETCH ONLY'

Text.val: update copmare field for concatinated sql statement
insert into SQL_QUERY if statement exist
update SQL string with necessary search tables
update SQL string with where clause

ExpSyntax.val: IF ({1,33}<>'' AND Upper (Left (Trim ({1,33}),6))='SELECT',Trim ({0,2})&' = g.DEBH_NO and g.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY='''&Trim ({1,9})&'''','g.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY='''&Trim ({1,9})&'''')
' and DHSH_DEBH_NO in (SELECT DEBH_NO FROM '&Trim ({0,1})&'/DEBH where DEBH_TEL like '''&Trim ({1,10})&'%'')'
' and a.DHSH_DEBH_NO in (SELECT DEBH_NO FROM '&Trim ({0,1})&'/DEBH where (DEBH_HADR_ZIP='''&Trim ({1,7})&''''&' or DEBH_PADR_ZIP='''&Trim ({1,7})&''')'&IF ({1,10}<>'',ExpCalc ('13'EXP),'')&')'

' and a.DHSH_DEBH_NO in (SELECT DEBH_NO FROM '&Trim ({0,1})&'/DEBH where (DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY='''&Trim ({1,9})&''''&' or DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY='''&Trim ({1,9})&''')'&IF ({1,10}<>'',ExpCalc ('13'EXP),'')&')'

' and a.DHSH_DEBH_NO in (SELECT DEBH_NO FROM '&Trim ({0,1})&'/DEBH WHERE (DEBH_HADR_ZIP='''&Trim ({1,7})&''''&' or DEBH_PADR_ZIP='''&Trim ({1,7})&') and (DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY='''&Trim ({1,9})&''''&' or DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY='''&Trim ({1,9})&''')'&IF ({1,10}<>'',ExpCalc ('13'EXP),'')&')'
ExpCalc ('20'EXP)&' WHERE '&Trim ({0,3})&' and DEBC_DEBH=a.DHSH_DEBH_NO and a.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=1 and a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,5})&'%'''&RTrim ({0,2})&' FOR FETCH ONLY'
ExpCalc ('20'EXP)&' WHERE '&Trim ({0,3})&' and DEBC_DEBH=a.DHSH_DEBH_NO and a.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=2 and a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,6})&'%'''&RTrim ({0,2})&' FOR FETCH ONLY'
ExpCalc ('20'EXP)&' WHERE '&Trim ({0,3})&' and DEBC_DEBH=a.DHSH_DEBH_NO and a.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=2 and a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&RTrim ({1,8})&'%'''&Trim ({0,2})&' FOR FETCH ONLY'

ExpCalc ('21'EXP)&' WHERE '&Trim ({0,3})&' and DEBC_DEBH=a.DHSH_DEBH_NO and a.DHSH_DEBH_NO=b.DHSH_DEBH_NO and a.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=1 and a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,5})&'%'''&' and b.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=2 and b.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,6})&'%'''&Trim ({0,2})&' FOR FETCH ONLY'

ExpCalc ('21'EXP)&' WHERE '&Trim ({0,3})&' and DEBC_DEBH=a.DHSH_DEBH_NO and a.DHSH_DEBH_NO=b.DHSH_DEBH_NO and a.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=1 and a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,5})&'%'''&' and b.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=4 and b.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,8})&'%'''&Trim ({0,2})&' FOR FETCH ONLY'

ExpCalc ('21'EXP)&' WHERE '&Trim ({0,3})&' and DEBC_DEBH=a.DHSH_DEBH_NO and a.DHSH_DEBH_NO=b.DHSH_DEBH_NO and a.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=2 and a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,6})&'%'''&' and b.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=4 and b.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,8})&'%'''&Trim ({0,2})&' FOR FETCH ONLY'

'SELECT a.DHSH_DEBH_NO FROM '&Trim ({0,1})&'/DHSH a,'&Trim ({0,1})&'/DHSH b,'&Trim ({0,1})&'/DHSH c WHERE a.DHSH_DEBH_NO=b.DHSH_DEBH_NO and a.DHSH_DEBH_NO=c.DHSH_DEBH_NO and a.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=1 and a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,5})&'%'''
RTrim ({1,33})&' and b.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=2 and b.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,6})&'%'''&' and c.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=4 and c.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,8})&'%'''&' FOR FETCH ONLY'

Text.val: simple SQL string if search criteria = id-number

ExpSyntax.val: 'SELECT DHIC_DEBH,CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(9,0)) FROM '&Trim ({0,1})&'/DHIC WHERE DHIC_ID='''&Trim ({1,13})&''' FOR FETCH ONLY'
' and DHSH_DEBH_NO in (SELECT DEBC_DEBH FROM '&Trim ({0,1})&'/DEBC where DEBC_BANKACCOUNT='''&Trim ({1,11})&''')'
' and g.DEBH_NO in (SELECT DEBC_DEBH FROM '&Trim ({0,1})&'/DEBC where DEBC_BANKACCOUNT='''&Trim ({1,11})&''')'
' and DHSH_DEBH_NO in (SELECT DEBC_DEBH FROM '&Trim ({0,1})&'/DEBC where DEBC_BANKID='&Str ({1,12},'#9')&')'
' and g.DEBH_NO in (SELECT DEBC_DEBH FROM '&Trim ({0,1})&'/DEBC where DEBC_BANKID='&Str ({1,12},'#9')&')'
' and DHSH_DEBH_NO in (SELECT DEBC_DEBH FROM '&Trim ({0,1})&'/DEBC where DEBC_BANKID='&Str ({1,12},'#9')&' and DEBC_BANKACCOUNT='''&Trim ({1,11})&''')'
' and g.DEBH_NO in (SELECT DEBC_DEBH FROM '&Trim ({0,1})&'/DEBC where DEBC_BANKID='&Str ({1,12},'#9')&' and DEBC_BANKACCOUNT='''&Trim ({1,11})&''')'

Text.val: write search result for DEBTOR HELLER
update SearchResult,if more than one result exist
update SearchResult with DEBH_NO if only one record
//06-06-2003 JP SCR #3690 decrease SearchRate ONLY until = 2 !!!
